ygData.subject: Fabian quest update
ygData.msgSnippet: Just saw this on the Bug Board. So the question now is what is the other coin collection quest he is referring to. Galtin of E ci Ok, Fabian has been put on
ygData.messageBody:
Just saw this on the Bug Board. So the question now is what is the other
coin collection quest he is referring to.

Galtin of E'ci

Ok, Fabian has been put on that League of Antonican Bard Faction.
Receiving the coin is random, its not 100% thing. I did the quest 10 times
and got the coin 3 times.
The coin I believe is for another coin collection quest, I think.
Hobart

http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum3/HTML/002669.html
